00028 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00029 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00030 from Koo import Rpc
00031 
00032 class FieldsModel( QStandardItemModel ):
00033         def __init__(self):
00034                 QStandardItemModel.__init__(self)
00035                 self.rootItem = self.invisibleRootItem()
00036                 self.setColumnCount( 1 )
00037                 self.setHeaderData( 0, Qt.Horizontal, QVariant( _('Fields') ) )
00038 
00039         def addField(self, text, data):
00040                 item = QStandardItem( text )            
00041                 item.setData( QVariant(data) )
00042                 self.rootItem.appendRow( item )
00043 
00044         def load(self, fields, fieldsInfo = {}, fieldsInvertedInfo = {}):
00045                 self.fieldsInfo = fieldsInfo
00046                 self.fieldsInvertedInfo = fieldsInvertedInfo
00047                 self.populate(fields)
00048 
00049         def populate(self, fields, prefix_node='', prefix=None, prefix_value='', level=2):
00050                 fields_order = fields.keys()
00051                 fields_order.sort(lambda x,y: -cmp(fields[x].get('string', ''), fields[y].get('string', '')))
00052                 if prefix == None:
00053                         prefix = self.rootItem
00054                 for field in fields_order:
00055                         st_name = fields[field]['string'] or field 
00056                         node = QStandardItem(st_name) 
00057                         node.setData( QVariant(field) )
00058                         if fields[field].get('required', False):
00059                                 font = node.font()
00060                                 font.setBold( True )
00061                                 node.setFont( font )
00062                         prefix.appendRow( node )
00063 
00064                         # Fill in cache structures
00065                         self.fieldsInvertedInfo[prefix_value+st_name] = prefix_node+field
00066                         self.fieldsInfo[prefix_node+field] = fields[field]
00067                         if prefix_node:
00068                                 self.fieldsInfo[prefix_node + field]['string'] = '%s%s' % (prefix_value, self.fieldsInfo[prefix_node + field]['string'])
00069                         # If it's a relation look at the children
00070                         if fields[field].get('relation', False) and level>0:
00071                                 fields2 = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', fields[field]['relation'], 'fields_get', False, Rpc.session.context)
00072                                 self.populate(fields2, prefix_node+field+'/', node, st_name+'/', level-1)
